{"id":1158795202,"question_id":3299,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1706411354,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1158795202/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Maximum Number of Elements in Subset","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumLength(int[] nums) {\n         \n        TreeMap<Long, Integer> map = new TreeMap<>();\n        \n        for(int n : nums){\n            map.put((long)n, map.getOrDefault((long)n,0)+1);\n        }\n        \n    \n        \n        Set<Long> set = new HashSet<>();\n        \n        int max= 1;\n        \n        \n        \n        if(map.containsKey(1L)){\n            if(map.get(1L)%2==1)\n                 max = Math.max(max, map.get(1L));\n            else \n                 max = Math.max(max, map.get(1L)-1);\n        }\n        for(long k : map.keySet()){\n            \n            \n            int cnt=0;\n            \n            while(map.containsKey(k) && !set.contains(k)){\n                \n                set.add(k);\n                cnt+=2;\n                k = k*k;\n            }\n           \n            \n          \n            max = Math.max(max, cnt-1);\n            // System.out.println(k+ \" \" +set+ \" \" +max);\n            \n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n        // 2 4 16 256 \n        //[x, x^2, x^4, x^8 , x^k/2, xk,\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-maximum-number-of-elements-in-subset","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
